titleStmt.title: The manner of the solemnity of the coronation of His most Sacred Majesty King Charles

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.C. and are to be sold by W. Gilbertson,

notesStmt.note: With an engraved portrait of Charles II and a set of verses addressed to him. The coronation described is that of Charles I.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Bodleian Library (Early English books, 1641-1700).
